TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConfigurationException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 发生配置系统错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a configuration system error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序尝试读取或写入数据的配置文件但未成功将引发异常。The exception is thrown if the application attempts to read or write data to the configuration file but is unsuccessful. 一些可能的原因可以纳入配置文件、 文件权限问题，以及配置属性的值不是有效的 XML 格式不正确。Some possible reasons for this can include malformed XML in the configuration file, file permission issues, and configuration properties with values that are not valid. > [!NOTE] > 对象为了保持向后兼容性。The object is maintained for backward compatibility. 对象将其替换为配置系统。The object replaces it for the configuration system.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

public: virtual property System::String ^ BareMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对引发此配置异常的原因的说明。

span.span: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

value.span: 对引发此 异常的原因的说明。

span.span: A description of why this exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不包含名称的配置文件中，也不在此的行号出现异常。The property does not contain the name of the configuration file, nor the line number at which this exception occurred. 如果您想在包含名称的配置文件和行号，以及返回的消息的消息属性，请使用属性。If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message returned by the property, use the property.

span.span: The path to the configuration file that caused this exception to be thrown.

summary.span: 用发生此配置异常处的文件名和行号设置 对象。

span.span: Sets the object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置对象与此文件名称和行号出现异常。The method sets a object with the file name and line number at which this exception occurred. 在反序列化期间重建异常通过流传输的对象。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the object that is transmitted over the stream.
